items.title: Wall Street’s on edge. These are the levels that stocks must not violate, says Fundstrat
items.description: Poor market breadth remains a concern according to Mark Newton

items.title: My late husband’s son is listed as beneficiary on his IRAs. Where does that leave me?
items.description: “My husband’s son said he doesn’t want any part of the IRAs or the insurance policies.”

items.title: ‘She’ll probably marry her current boyfriend’: Should I give my daughter my $300K house — or gift her the cash to buy it?
How bitcoin has historically responded to bear markets
items.description: Historically, bitcoin entering a bear market has been great buying opportunity. But not always.

items.title: Nomura strategist warned the market selloff was coming . Here are the forces he says are taking stocks down.
items.description: Leveraged ETFs, and a highly unbalanced market have been among the forces bubbling away at this market for weeks, a highly respected strategist notes.
